languages.text: "А ты так ловко стенал об убитых им служках..."
"And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
languages.original_text: "А ты так ловко стенал об убитых им служках..."

traits.locale_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
"And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
"And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
"And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
"And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
"And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."

languages.text: "Und dabei habt Ihr so schön um die Diener geklagt, die er getötet hat ..."
languages.original_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."

traits.locale_text: "Und dabei habt Ihr so schön um die Diener geklagt, die er getötet hat ..."

languages.text: «Con lo bien que se le daba lloriquear por los siervos a los que mató...».
languages.original_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."

traits.locale_text: «Con lo bien que se le daba lloriquear por los siervos a los que mató...».

languages.text: 「奴が殺した従者のことを、随分とうまく嘆けたものだな…」
languages.original_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."

traits.locale_text: 「奴が殺した従者のことを、随分とうまく嘆けたものだな…」

languages.text: “你之前居然还像模像样地哀悼那些被他杀害的仆人……”
languages.original_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."

traits.locale_text: “你之前居然还像模像样地哀悼那些被他杀害的仆人……”

languages.text: « Quand je pense à la comédie que vous nous avez jouée à propos des serviteurs qu'il a tués... »
languages.original_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."

traits.locale_text: « Quand je pense à la comédie que vous nous avez jouée à propos des serviteurs qu'il a tués... »

languages.text: "Onun öldürdüğü hizmetkârlar için matemli sözler sarf etmekte de çok iyiydin."
languages.original_text: "And you were so good at moaning about the servants he killed..."
